title: Mister Bagel
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Bagels, pastries, and sandwiches place frequented by local fishermen as well students. Known for its bagels, which include gluten-free ones. Each day a dozen different types of bagels. Has tofu/soy cream cheese: plain tofu, olive tofu, cinnamon raisin tofu, and veggie tofu. Keeps on hand soy milk for coffee drinks.
